review: I have my firestick hooked up to my vizio TV and every 10 minutes or so the firestick shuts my TV off.
author: Purchasing SFS

review: Received this as a gift. I am impressed.  So easy to set up. Buffers rarely. Picture quality is wonderful. Would highly recommend this product  I have the smart tv but this beats that hands down
author: Joyce B

review: I like it a lot so convenient
author: jenny s.

review: This product the best I have owned. I have had the Roku and the Chromecast, and neither of them compared to the speed of the Fire Tv Stick.
author: prsims88

review: The Fire Stick is fast and worth the money
author: luda
